name: Parental Skipper
description: Automatically skip manually defined scenes for content moderation. Allows you to skip awkward/embarrassing scenes in movies and shows when watching with family and friends.
overview: Skip restricted scenes automatically during playback

versions.changelog: Fixed 405 error when adding segments: use direct fetch with auth headers matching intro-skipper pattern. See https://github.com/KeshavKhanth/ParentalSkipper/releases/tag/v1.0.3
Major UI improvements: HH:MM:SS time format, Reason field, Live search, Series Season/Episode dropdowns. See https://github.com/KeshavKhanth/ParentalSkipper/releases/tag/v1.0.2
Fixed plugin loading issues with proper logging and safe database initialization. See https://github.com/KeshavKhanth/ParentalSkipper/releases/tag/v1.0.1
Initial release with manual scene skipping functionality. See https://github.com/KeshavKhanth/ParentalSkipper/releases/tag/v1.0.0
